brief_summary.textblock:
The clinical trial was designed to evaluate the safety against Group ACYW135 Meningococcal
      Polysaccharide Vaccine of Hualan administered on subjects 2 years of age and older.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine 001

detailed_description.textblock:
Complying with requirements of the approval letter of clinical trial issued by SFDA
      (Approval Letter No.: 2006L01017), Hualan conducted phase I clinical trial of Group ACYW135
      Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine. The safety end points were the presence of any
      systemic, local and adverse reaction.

intervention.description: 60 subjects were divided into three groups (20 subjects each group), adult (16~30 years of age), early youth (7~15 years of age) and children (2~6 years of age) to receive Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine, 0.5 ml, one dose regime

clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine

overall_official.affiliation: Immunization Program Institute of Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

primary_outcome.description: All systemic and local adverse reactions and related adverse events on day 28 after the vaccination

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
